alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Knott; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Knott, southern Floyd and southwestern Pike Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Handshoe, or 10 miles northeast of Hindman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bosco, Larkslane and Hueysville around 545 PM EDT. Estill, Glo, Betty, Porter Junction, Garret, Eastern, Langley and Hollybush around 550 PM EDT. Wayland, Demo, Raven, Hunter, Printer and Kite around 555 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Orkney, East McDowell, McDowell, Price, Minnie, Drift, Topmost, Dry Creek, Hi Hat, Buckingham, Burton, Blue Moon, Honaker, Halo, Wheelwright, Craynor, Buckhorn Hollow, Ligon, Melvin, Grethel, Beaver, Galveston, Osborn, Virgie and Jonancy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
